name: Honky! The Race Card Game
description:
Now you can really play the race card!

Honky! The Race Card Game is a fun, fast-paced, trick-taking card game where the four suits have been replaced with the races of the world: White, Black, Brown and Yellow. Collect both halves of a racial slur, yell it out and that race becomes superior! But beware the special cards like the interfering Media or the PC Brigade that makes you swap hands with another player so you can “see things from their perspective”.

For 2-4 players. Pack comes in a hard plastic case and includes 54 cards and rules.

Prices are in New Zealand Dollars. Shipping will be calculated once you add to cart.

See www.honky.co.nz for more information.
